en_text: Change all orbs to Water, Dark, and Jammer orbs

jp_skill.name: 貴様を我が敵と認識
jp_skill.raw_description: 全ドロップを水、闇、お邪魔ドロップに変化。

kr_skill.name: I recognize you as my enemy
kr_skill.raw_description: Changes all Orbs to Water Orbs, Dark Orbs & Jammers
